department: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Quebec
short_summary: Improvements to the site drainage and storm sewer system at the Edmonton Maximum Security Institution (EMSI)
description: The project involves repairing existing storm sewer lines, restoring and paving asphalt areas, cleaning and inspecting storm lines, and upgrading the storm lift station.
full_summary:
# Edmonton Institution Site Drainage Improvements Project

## Tender Details

* **Tender Title:** EW038-240214: Site Drainage and Storm Sewer System Improvements at Edmonton Institution
* **Reference Number:** WS4053496230-Doc4053678618
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4053496230
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 8, 2023 at 2:00 PM (AST)
* **Amendment Date:** August 2, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** September 25, 2024

## Project Description

The Edmonton Maximum Security Institution (EMSI) Site Drainage Improvements Project involves upgrades to the site drainage and storm sewer system. This includes, but is not limited to:

* Repairing existing storm sewer lines
* Restoring and repaving asphalt areas
* Cleaning and conducting CCTV inspection of existing storm lines
* Upgrading the existing storm lift station

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (CNST)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason:** N/A

## Contact Information

* **Contact:** Alex Tikhonovitch, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email:** alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not available
* **Fax:** Not available
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16573133](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16573133)

## Regions and Trade Agreements

* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
